document_data.name: Chaserperi Warehouse
document_data.mainbody: '''Chaserperi Warehouse''' was a warehouse in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] that was owned by the [[Chaserperi]] family, beginning with [[Auldo Chaserperi]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Rumors claimed that at some point Auldo Chaserperi discovered a [[lich]] in the cellars of a house he had purchased in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. Audlo was said to have struck a bargain with the lich, offering it materials and dead bodies in return for helping to defend his warehouse.
